mapper.delete: delete from tbl_oxanswer where sdno = #{sdno} and userid = #{userid}
mapper.select: select s1.sdno, s1.smno, min(sdcontent)sdcontent , sum(if(STRCMP(answer,'O'),0,1)) oresult , sum(if(STRCMP(answer,'X'),0,1)) xresult from (select smno, sdno, sdcontent from tbl_surveydetail where smno = #{smno} ) s1, (select smno, sdno, answer from tbl_oxanswer where smno = #{smno} ) s2 where s1.sdno = s2.sdno and s1.smno = s2.smno group by s1.sdno, s1.smno
